definition: fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Slip-on construction with front and rear goring for a secure, comfortable fit.
sentences.chinese: 滑上建设一个安全，舒适合脚的前部和后部戈林。

sentences.english: "The work station should fit your body like a comfortable pair of shoes, " Young said.
sentences.chinese: 工作间对你的身体来说应该像一双合脚的鞋子。

sentences.english: She is breaking in a new pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她正在试穿一双新鞋使之逐渐合脚。

sentences.english: A good, relaxing pair of sneakers are your best bet every time.
sentences.chinese: 一双舒适合脚的旅游鞋在任何时候都是你的好选择。

sentences.english: Get a good pair of shoes that fit properly.
sentences.chinese: 所以要穿一双合脚的鞋子。

sentences.english: They are durable, fit well, and are versatile because they have so many colors.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子很耐磨，合脚，变化多端，那么多色彩。

sentences.english: The shoes are a perfect fit.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子穿着非常合脚。

sentences.english: Asymmetrical sling-back strap with elastic for a comfortable fit.
sentences.chinese: 百对称的细带，有松紧，更合脚。

sentences.english: New shoes are stiff until you break them in.
sentences.chinese: 新鞋合脚前都是硬梆梆的。

sentences.english: Try them on to see whether they fit and are comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 在买前，请务必使穿以确保合脚和舒适。

definition: to feet the feet perfectly/to follow closely/hard on sb's heels
toe box (of a shoe)/shoe last (shoemaker's tool)
